title: Justin Bieber posts rare throwback photos from his pre-teen days
text:
He's one of the most famous stars on the planet, but that doesn't mean his inner circle is made up only of celebrities.

And on Tuesday, Justin Bieber, 25, took to Instagram to wish his childhood friend Chaz a 'Happy Birthday.'

The recently-married singer shared a collage of throwback snaps of himself with his pal.

A true friend: On Tuesday, Justin Bieber, 25, took to Instagram to wish his childhood friend Chaz a 'Happy Birthday'

'Happy birthday chaz!! You are the funniest, kindest, coolest person I know and I’m better because your in my life. Excited for what the future holds,' he wrote.

The photos took his fans down memory lane, as almost all of the snaps looked to be from Justin's career beginnings as a pre-teen.

From snapback hats to the classic Bieber side style, the photos showcased the duo playing baseball together, dressing in their skater-inspired gear and bundling up for winter.

Memory lane: The recently-married singer shared a collage of throwback snaps of himself with his pal

The past: The photos took his fans down memory lane, as almost all of the snaps looked to be from Justin's career beginnings as a pre-teen

Funny: From snapback hats to the classic Bieber side style, the photos showcased the duo playing baseball together, dressing in their skater-inspired gear and bundling up for winter

Justin showed just what a true friend he was to honor his pal, after having come off of his recent wedding.

The Baby singer wed wife Hailey Rhode Bieber in a church ceremony in South Carolina on September 30.

The couple first married in secret at a courthouse in New York last year.

Taken: The Baby singer wed wife Hailey Rhode Bieber in a church ceremony in South Carolina on September 30

However, Hailey insisted on Twitter at the time that she had not yet married.

'I understand where the speculation is coming from, but I'm not married yet!' she wrote, in reportedly deleted Tweet.

Justin and Hailey are both Christians, and separate sources at the time told People explained why the model did not feel she was married yet.

A friend noted that the beauty felt that 'a civil ceremony and their real wedding are two separate things.'

A faith-based source explained the difference: 'What happened at the courthouse is a courthouse thing, a legal thing. But marriage is two people making a vow before God and the people they love.'

The duo are reportedly set to marry on September 30, at South Carolina's Montage Palmetto Bluff, according to TMZ.
description: He's one of the most famous stars on the planet, but that doesn't mean his inner circle is made up of celebrities only. Justin Bieber, 25, wished his friend Chaz a 'Happy Birthday.'
